problem.p:
A simple pendulum (a small massive object suspended on a long light string) is at rest in the state of equilibrium. The force of tension in the string is \(T\). The pendulum is then pulled sideways until the string makes an unknown angle \(\theta\) with the vertical and released. As the pendulum swings back, the force of tension at the bottom point of the swing is now 2\(T\).
Find the unknown angle \(\theta\) (in degrees).
